entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 25. POP 30%
